enchantment.shields.launching.desc: Gives a chance to launch attackers away when the shield is disabled.
enchantment.shields.evokering.desc: Introduces a chance for evoker fangs to spawn underneath attackers when blocking an attack.
enchantment.shields.bracing.desc: Decreases the cooldown when the shield is disabled by an axe attack.
enchantment.shields.lifebound.desc: Gives a chance to absorb health from the attacker when blocking an attack.
enchantment.shields.momentum.desc: Gives a brief speed boost when their shield is disabled.
item.shields.shield_patch_kit.no_damage: Your shield isn't damaged enough to use the repair kit!
